projectGridLines.title: Machine Learning
projectGridLines.description:
Description: PS II candidates will work on implementing machine learning

models which will be used to pre-label images, videos & sensor data to speed

up data labeling. This includes models for Object Detection, Tracking, Semantic

Segmentation & Optical Character Recognition.

Skill sets: Analytical thinking, Programming, Written and Verbal

Communication, Presentation, Problem Solving

Expected learning:

A role that provides all round development to candidates

? Understand the software development life-cycle for Machine

learning projects

? Writing production grade code & test cases for quality control

? Learn how to read research papers to evaluate various

algorithms and find ones that satisfy business requirements

Specific courses required for project execution : Machine Learning, Deep

Learning (Preferred)
